channel.title: CVE Feed for Google Inc. -- Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google Inc. -- Android

item.title: CVE-2017-0702|2024-09-16T16:37:57.276Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android system ui. Product: Android. Versions: 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36621442.

item.title: CVE-2017-0793|2024-09-16T18:24:28.087Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A information disclosure vulnerability in the N/A memory subsystem. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-35764946.

item.title: CVE-2017-13192|2024-09-16T18:59:12.998Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In the ihevcd_parse_slice_header function of ihevcd_parse_slice_header.c a slice address of zero after the first slice could result in an infinite loop. This could lead to a remote denial of service of a critical system process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-64380202.

item.title: CVE-2014-9955|2024-09-16T16:28:31.557Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Qualcomm closed source components. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-36384686.

item.title: CVE-2018-9505|2024-09-16T19:10:01.885Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In mca_ccb_hdl_req of mca_cact.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9.0 Android ID: A-110791536

item.title: CVE-2017-13208|2024-09-16T17:19:18.730Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In receive_packet of libnetutils/packet.c, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to a missing bounds check on the DHCP response. This could lead to remote code execution as a privileged process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-67474440.

item.title: CVE-2017-13275|2024-09-16T16:14:14.058Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In getVSCoverage of CmapCoverage.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-70808908.

item.title: CVE-2017-13305|2024-09-16T18:13:39.183Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A information disclosure vulnerability in the Upstream kernel encrypted-keys. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-70526974.

item.title: CVE-2018-9357|2024-09-16T17:07:46.072Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In BNEP_Write of bnep_api.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with User execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android-6.0 Android-6.0.1 Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android ID: A-74947856.

item.title: CVE-2017-13259|2024-09-16T16:37:59.526Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In functionality implemented in sdp_discovery.cc, there are possible out of bounds reads due to missing bounds checks. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-68161546.

item.title: CVE-2017-13176|2024-09-16T17:38:00.909Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In the parseURL function of URLStreamHandler, there is improper input validation of the host field. This could lead to a remote elevation of privilege that could enable bypassing user interaction requirements with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-68341964.

item.description: In process_l2cap_cmd of l2c_main.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. item.title: CVE-2017-0777|2024-09-16T17:08:53.178Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A information disclosure vulnerability in the Android media framework (n/a). Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-38342499.

item.title: CVE-2017-13193|2024-09-16T16:49:17.587Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In ihevcd_decode.c there is a possible infinite loop due to bytes for an sps of unsupported resolution resulting in the same sps being fed in over and over. This could lead to a remote denial of service of a critical system process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-65718319.

item.title: CVE-2017-13196|2024-09-16T19:47:27.315Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In several places in ihevcd_decode.c, a dead loop could occur due to incomplete frames which could lead to memory leaks. This could lead to a remote denial of service of a critical system process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-63522067.

item.title: CVE-2017-0840|2024-09-16T19:51:15.117Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Android media framework (libstagefright). Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-62948670.

item.title: CVE-2017-13182|2024-09-16T19:52:15.231Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In the sendFormatChange function of ACodec, there is a possible integer overflow which could lead to an out-of-bounds write. This could lead to a local elevation of privilege enabling code execution as a privileged process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-67737022.

item.title: CVE-2017-13217|2024-09-16T19:09:18.479Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In DisplayFtmItem in the bootloader, there is an out-of-bounds write due to reading a string without verifying that it's null-terminated. This could lead to a secure boot bypass and a local elevation of privilege enabling code execution as a privileged process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-68269077.

item.title: CVE-2018-9516|2024-09-16T17:09:12.114Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In hid_debug_events_read of drivers/hid/hid-debug.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android Versions: Android kernel Android ID: A-71361580.

item.title: CVE-2017-13288|2024-09-16T16:59:05.258Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In writeToParcel and readFromParcel of PeriodicAdvertisingReport.java, there is a permission bypass due to a 64/32bit int mismatch. This could lead to a local escalation of privilege where the user can start an activity with system privileges, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-69634768.

item.description: In avrc_pars_browsing_cmd of avrc_pars_tg.cc, there is a possible stack buffer overflow due to an incorrect bounds check. item.title: CVE-2017-13197|2024-09-16T19:10:13.070Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In the ihevcd_parse_slice.c function, slave threads are not joined if there is an error. This could lead to a remote denial of service of a critical system process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-64784973.

item.title: CVE-2017-13180|2024-09-16T18:12:49.078Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: In the onQueueFilled function of SoftAVCDec, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to a use after free if a bad header causes the decoder to get caught in a loop while another thread frees the memory it's accessing. This could lead to a local elevation of privilege enabling code execution as a privileged process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1. Android ID: A-66969349.

item.title: CVE-2017-0832|2024-09-16T19:36:56.103Z -- google%20inc. -- android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android media framework (libmpeg2). Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-62887820.
